!Ketra's Messenger Wahkan: What are you doing, dear comrade? Please, attack the Varka Silenos and bring us *300 badges of grunts, 300 badges of officers, 200 badges of captains and the Totem of Valor*! This totem can be obtained by fulfilling the *Prove your Courage* quest, a mission assigned by Hierarch Kadun Zu Ketra. You don't want to quit, do you?
